name: The Presidential Name Is In The Middle Quiz | People | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Martin.

	Dean Martin was a celebrated member of the 'Rat Pack', Martin Van Buren never performed in Las Vegas.

Jackson.

	Andrew Jackson was a military hero of the War of 1812. Jackson Pollock founded 'Action Painting', but saw no 'action' in the War of 1812.

James.

	Susan Saint James starred as Rock Hudson's wife in the TV series 'McMillan and Wife'. James Monroe did not have any part in a TV police series.

Franklin.

	Ben Franklin was brilliantly illuminated by a kite, Franklin Pierce shone brightest in the White House. "Benjamin Franklin Pierce" is also Hawkeye's full name in the TV version of M*A*S*H.

Cleveland.

	Grover Cleveland worked to stabilize currency. Cleveland Amory worked to destabilize the meat market.

Harrison.

	Benjamin Harrison was the grandson of the 9th President, William Henry Harrison, Harrison Ford is not Henry Ford's grandson. And Gerald Ford has nothing to do with this question.

Thomas.

	Danny Thomas, whose real name was Amos Jacobs was an actor, comedian and producer. Thomas Jefferson, whose real name was Thomas Jefferson was not a comedian but he did write the Declaration of Independence and produced quite a bit of controversy.

Calvin.

	John Calvin started 'Calvinism' establishing the Bible as the only source of knowledge. Calvin Coolidge, was sworn in with the Bible.

Arthur.

	Chester Alan Arthur followed James Garfield as president. Arthur C. Clarke followed '2001, A Space Odyssey' with '2010, Odyssey Two'.

Truman.

	Harry S Truman was a haberdasher from Missouri, who went on to become a president of 'atomic' proportions. Truman Capote, the flamboyant southern author could provoke 'explosive' reactions to his works.
